varchar(11) not null, id int4 not null, primary key (id)) Hibernate: create table tb_Curso (id int4 not null, carga_horaria int4 not null, categoria char(1) not null, data_inicio date not null, administrativo_id int4 not null, aluno_id int4 not null, instrutor_id int4 not null, primary key (id)) Hibernate: create table tb_Funcionario (cargo varchar(255) not null, id int4 not null, primary key (id)) Hibernate: create table tb_Instrutor (cnh varchar(11) not null, id int4 not null, primary key (id)) Hibernate: create table tb_Pessoa (id int4 not null, cpf varchar(11) not null, data_de_nasc date, nome varchar(255) not null, telefone varchar(255) not null, primary key (id)) Hibernate: alter table Curso_aulas add constraint FKtlcturwij1cutd9iywjvf1kfu foreign key (Curso_id) references tb_Curso Hibernate: alter table tb_Aluno add constraint FKogi7u3y52lklow8s67pt3y0ca foreign key (id) references tb_Pessoa Hibernate: alter table tb_Curso add constraint tb_Aluno Hibernate: alter table tb_Curso add constraint FKdn30arxcr9uxssenplnl87r5c foreign key (instrutor_id) references tb_Instrutor Hibernate: alter table tb_Funcionario add constraint FKg3w7fdlfsdp0ugdeqfqp7e5xe foreign key (id) references tb_Pessoa Hibernate: alter table tb_Instrutor add constraint FKpc4onqb2x1cgr4quepmto40if foreign key (id) references tb_Pessoa Conexão aberta.
